snippet: With the women’s final already moved to Sunday because of severe weather, the suspension of the men’s semifinal between Novak Djokovic and David Ferrer also moved the men’s final to Monday.
abstract: With the women’s final already moved to Sunday because of severe weather, the suspension of the men’s semifinal between Novak Djokovic and David Ferrer also moved the men’s final to Monday.

headline.main: Women's Final Is Moved to Sunday, Men's Final to Monday
